documents.document: So, are you ready? You know what I’m talking about. Are you ready? :)
Warm thanks to everyone for support and encouragement. Jim would want me to carry on, so I will. I’ll keep @Jim_Rohn_Quotes alive and well.
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret and disappointment.” ~Jim Rohn ...
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.” ~Jim Rohn #ji ...
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “It is the set of the sails—not the direction of the wind—that determines which way we will go.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn ...
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote Thank you Jim for being truly ex ...
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “The major value in life is not what you get. The major value in life is what you become.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.” ~Jim Rohn #RIP #jimrohn # ...
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “I promise you this as we leave here: I will not leave you behind. I’ll take you with me in my thoughts and in my h ...
Jim was made of special kind of Awesome. I really miss him. Thank you all for your kind messages and beautiful support. #jimrohn
As a tribute to Jim, I’m dedicating a new Twitter account for his great wisdom and inspiration @Jim_Rohn_Quotes #jimrohn Please RT
“Don’t wish it was easier—wish you were better.” ~Jim Rohn (September 17, 1930 - December 5, 2009) #RIP #jimrohn #quote
RIP The Legendary Mr Jim Rohn www.jimrohn.com #jimrohn Please RT
I had planned to meet him next year, but I guess it will have to wait. I’m extremely sad, but also really thankful for all he has done.
I’m sorry to interrupt this, but I just learned the the awesome, one and only, Mr Jim Rohn has passed away today. He was one of my mentors.
Each quote was assigned an ID number based on the order in which they were submitted. The first one was 01, the second 02, and so forth…
So. Are you ready? :)
The #GoogleWave invite draw is closed, big thanks to everyone who took part! As thanks, I’ve decided to give away TWO invites. Stay tuned :)
“Love is two minds without a single thought.” ~Philip Barry #GQ #love #quote
“Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.” ~Voltaire #GQ #love #quote
I think that’s it for tonight. Thank you for the awesome week! Over 40 quotes in the #GoogleWave draw already. You have until morning :)
“Maybe, just once, someone will call me ‘Sir’ without adding ‘you’re making a scene.’ ” ~Homer J. Simpson #lol #quote
“What is my loftiest ambition? I’ve always wanted to throw an egg at an electric fan.” ~Oliver Herford #GQ #lol #quote
@SUPERRROCKSTAR I’m happy to hear that you gave me the chance to make things right! :)
“I haven’t spoken to my wife in years. I didn’t want to interrupt her.” ~Rodney Dangerfield #lol #quote
With all that gratitude out in the open, I think it’s time for a couple of the ever popular Friday Funnies :)
I hope nobody feels neglected, but if you do, please let me know! I shall fix it. Promise :)
@merhytes Thank you, I like you too! :)
… not forgetting the great @LiteraryNobody @LollyDaskal @terrymslobodian @NickolasHappy @xanpearson Big thanks to you all! :) #FF
I also want to mention my other friends @girlwithnoname @sillysweetness @misschanto @YoungBillyMays @Nessagirly #FF …
… #FF @TDAllonsy @ArwaAlaslai @INrLifePractice @mamainside @AllThingsGwen Thank you guys!
Other really nice people @IloveTwilightBR @danielleraexx @maracandelaria @SUPERRROCKSTAR @Monicutza03449 #FF …
Unquestionably the best conversationalist ★ @just1heather ★ Big thanks, Heather!
Without question the two most faithful retweeters in the whole world ★ @Jenn_Chinn ★ @oOoOoBarracuda ★ Huge thanks for your loyalty.
I would like to thank you all individually, but Twitter might suspend my account if I did that :) But there are some I just have to mention…
By retweeting that you just proved my point even further! Thank you :)
I think I’ve met some of the nicest people on Twitter. I really do. And I mean you. Yes YOU. Thank you for being awesome! :)
You know what I think?
“The best way you can cheer yourself up is to cheer someone else up.” ~Mark Twain #GQ #cheerup #quote
Some #FollowFriday gratitude about to flow after the gym! And there’s still time to take part in the #GoogleWave invite draw with a quote :)
“To be good is noble, but to show others how to be good is nobler and no trouble.” ~Mark Twain #GQ #goodness #quote
“The pain passes, but the beauty remains.” ~Pierre-Auguste Renoir #GQ #beauty #quote
“Health is not a condition of matter, but of mind.” ~Mary Baker Eddy #GQ #health #quote
“…American Idol won’t make you a star, beating Guitar Hero doesn’t mean you play guitar” ~MC Lars #GQ #lyrics #quote #MusicMonday
“…beating Rock Band doesn’t mean you rock, beating Tony Hawk doesn’t make you Tony Hawk…” ~MC Lars #GQ #lyrics #quote #MusicMonday
“…Grand Theft Auto doesn’t make you a player, playing Sim City doesn’t make you a mayor…” ~MC Lars #GQ #lyrics #quote #MusicMonday
“…beating Gears of War doesn’t make you Winston Churchill, quoting 90s sitcoms doesn’t make you Steve Urkel…” ~MC Lars #GQ #lyrics #quote
“…watching CSI doesn’t make you a detective, playing Mario Paint doesn’t mean you have perspective…” ~MC Lars #GQ #lyrics #quote #mm
“…friends on MySpace won’t make you a musician, beating Operation doesn’t make you a physician…” ~MC Lars #GQ #lyrics #quote #MusicMonday
“…beating Apples to Apples doesn’t make you a farmer, watching UFC won’t make you any harder…” ~MC Lars #GQ #lyrics #quote #MusicMonday
“Beating Call of Duty doesn’t mean your aim is good, beating Wii Golf doesn’t make you Tiger Woods…” ~MC Lars #GQ #lyrics #quote
“Now things are bright, a blinding light, the kind that leaves the marks you see” ~Stevie Gee @steviegeeeee #lyrics #MusicMonday
“Why do we say things we can’t take back, why do we miss what we never had” ~Tedder / Lewis / Muckala / Cates / Robbins #lyrics #MusicMonday
@DrDevesh Not really, no, I just gave you your once a year ;)
@DrDevesh I guess TweetDeck is still broken and doesn’t let you track back to which tweet I replied. Oh well ;)
“But now I’m broken and I’ve spoken everything there is to say, I’m having trouble sleeping now that night has gone away” ~@steviegeeeee #mm
@DrDevesh Consider it done, then, for this twenty-ten ;)
“Social order at the expense of liberty is hardly a bargain.” ~Marquis de Sade #GQ #quote
“Problems worthy of attack prove their worth by hitting back.” ~Piet Hein #GQ #life #quote
@just1heather I know, I was amazed as well :)
“You never saw a very busy person who was unhappy.” ~Dorothy Dix #GQ #happiness #quote
@BLK_Magnum No worries, I guess I just need to be more vigilant :)
@BLK_Magnum Really? That’s strange, interesting and also a little bit depressing ;)
Another observation: we used to be the same age, but now you’re a lot older than I am.
@BLK_Magnum Never mind, just an observation :P
Interesting, my old tattoos still fit :)
“Love endures only when the lovers love many things together and not merely each other.” ~Walter Lippmann #GQ #love #quote
@PriscillaRoman No doubt whatsoever ;)
“The strength of a woman can carry the weight of the world.” ~Sarah Pezdek-Smith #GQ #strength #quote
“Reality is that which, when you stop believing in it, doesn’t go away.” ~Philip K. Dick #GQ #reality #quote
“Getting results through people is a skill that cannot be learned in the classroom.” ~Jean Paul Getty #GQ #management #quote
“Good company in a journey makes the way seem shorter.” ~Izaak Walton #GQ #friends #quote
@just1heather Thank you ma’am, and ditto ;)
@just1heather “As long as you’re green, you’re growing. As soon as you’re ripe, you start to rot.” ~Raymond ‘Ray’ Kroc :) #GQ #growth #quote
Ok, why exactly is Madonna still, after all these years, urging me to like an unnamed virgin?
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
“Silent gratitude isn’t much use to anyone.” ~Gladys Bronwyn Stern #GQ #gratitude #quote
“A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.” ~Walter Winchell #GQ #friendship #quote
@misschanto You just made my week :) <3
I can’t believe I almost left out @misschanto @kbthing2 @sillysweetness! Big ♥ to you :) #FollowFriday
I want to give special thanks and flow special ♥ to @just1heather @Nessagirly @Jenn_Chinn @oOoOoBarracuda ♥ Thank you. #FollowFriday
I’ve had the good fortune of meeting amazing people here on Twitter. I think you are all amazing, thanks for hanging around the old GQ.
@just1heather Bon appetit. You’ll be getting an official thank-you, too :)
Also grateful for your mention, RT & FF ♥ @NatashaD83 @abc4rebt @MsDivaRoyale @HisFallenQueen #FollowFriday
More mention, RT & FF ♥ gratitude flowing @crispyoinkie @miracled10 @Tanzanianwb @Iva_M_Cullen @Dimple_Pretty @ObinnaEboh #FollowFriday
Sweet thanks for mention, RT & FF ♥ @danielleraexx @PatySoBe @whalensk @maracandelaria @AmandeeTweets @SUPERRROCKSTAR #FollowFriday
@oOoOoBarracuda “It will have blood, they say; blood will have blood.” ~William Shakespeare #quote
“…Mmm whatcha say? Mmm that it’s just what we need, you decided this” ~Imogen Heap #lyrics #quote
“…Mmm whatcha say, mmm that it’s all for the best? Of course it is…” ~Imogen Heap #lyrics #quote
“Mmm whatcha say, mmm that you only meant well? Well of course you did…” ~Imogen Heap #lyrics #quote
“So when you say that you need me, that you’ll never leave me, I know you’re wrong, you’re not that strong, let me go” ~George Michael
“Men kick friendship around like a football and it doesn’t seem to crack. Women treat it like glass and it falls to pieces.” ~Anne Lindbergh
“When I needed you most when I needed a friend, you let me down now like I let you down then” ~Blink 182 #lyrics #friendship #quote
“Man’s chief merit consists in resisting the impulses of his nature.” ~Samuel Johnson #GQ #life #quote
“When a man does all he can, though it succeeds not well, blame not him that did it.” ~George Washington #GQ #life #quote
@Nessagirly Awww, sorry to hear that. Not the swineys, though, I hope.
@NatashaD83 Awesome! Really glad I was able to deliver :)
“The worst crime against working people is a company which fails to operate at a profit.” ~Samuel Gompers #GQ #business #quote
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “Effective communication is 20% what you know and 80% how you feel about what you know.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
